info.name: Testing-intervals-multiShift-detailedReport
info.description:
## Documentation for used collection and data file # Collection This collection is for multi-shifts test cases which are included in this [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1IEwWfIIY2fx70rCU50k8Vftt5AlELAm2q2rf7WqQe8c/edit?gid=1203718845#gid=1203718845) and they are: - TC-00003 - TC-00004 - TC-00012 - TC-00013 - TC-00014 - TC-00028 Colletion include the following requests: Login Web Account Admin & Verification codeBoth requests are responsible for login and authenticate user Edit checkIn & Edit checkout Both requests are responsible for use checkin & checkout And they are duplicated to simulate two shifts actions (Shift-1 & Shift-2) Detailed-Report
Responsible for generating report And all test-scripts are included in this request # Data file "intervalMultiShiftDetailedReport.csv" File include 6 rows each row represent a test case with it's validations. File is used to provide data to collection variables. ### File structure | **column name** | **reflected value in data file** | **reflected value in data base** | | --- | --- | --- | | TCsId | Test case number which is match the test case number in the used sheet | None | | userId | User that will be used when run test case | UserId | | shift1SessionIdCheckIn
(shift1 or shift2) | Session id generated when user create a checkin action | sessionId | | shift1TransactionIdCheckin
(shift1 or shift2) | Transaction id generated when user create a checkin action | transactionId | | shift1CheckIn
(shift1 or shift2) | Date and time for checkin which is provided by user | createDate | | shift1SessionIdCheckOut
(shift1 or shift2) | Session id generated when user create a checkout action | sessionId | | shift1TransactionIdCheckOut
(shift1 or shift2) | Transaction id generated when user create a checkout action | transactionId | | Shift1CheckOut
(shift1 or shift2) | Date and time for checkout which is provided by user | createDate | | ReportFrom | Start date for generated reportat | FromDate | | ReportTo | End date for generated reportat | ToDate | | SessionTotalActualHoursWorkShift1
(shift1 or shift2) | ساعات الدوام الفعلي | SessionTotalActualHoursWork | | TotalHoursWorkDuringInterval | مجموع ساعات الدوام الفعلي | TotalHoursWorkDuringInterval | | SessionTotalOverTimeHoursShift1
(shift or shift2) | العمل الإضافي | SessionTotalOverTimeHours | | TotalHoursOverTimeHoursDuringInterval | مجموع ساعات العمل الإضافي | TotalHoursOverTimeHoursDuringInterval | | OutNextDayShift1
(shift1 or shift2) | Boolean flag used check if this shift extend to next day or not | OutNextDay | | StatusShift1
(shift1 or shift2) | حالة التحضير | Status |

exec: // Retrieve the collection name from the collection variable
//Search in array elements for shift 1 object by it's "Transaction id"
//this condition was added to hande the case of absent shift
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+":  Validate that Session Total Actual Hours Work for is correct", function () {

pm.expect(actualSessionTotalActualHoursWorkShift1,`Expected session total actual hours to be ${expectedSessionTotalActualHoursWorkShift1}, but got ${actualSessionTotalActualHoursWorkShift1}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalActualHoursWorkShift1);

pm.expect(actualSessionTotalActualHoursWorkShift2,`Expected session total actual hours to be ${expectedSessionTotalActualHoursWorkShift2}, but got ${actualSessionTotalActualHoursWorkShift2}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalActualHoursWorkShift2);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+":  Validate that Total Hours During Interval is correct", function () {

pm.expect(actualTotalHoursWorkDuringInterval,`Expected total hours during interval to be ${expectedTotalHoursWorkDuringInterval}, but got ${actualTotalHoursWorkDuringInterval}`).to.equal(expectedTotalHoursWorkDuringInterval);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+":  Validate that Session Total OverTIme for is correct", function () {

pm.expect(actualSessionTotalOverTimeHoursShift1,`Expected session total overTime to be ${expectedSessionTotalOverTimeHoursShift1}, but got ${actualSessionTotalOverTimeHoursShift1}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalOverTimeHoursShift1);

pm.expect(actualSessionTotalOverTimeHoursShift2,`Expected session total overTime to be ${expectedSessionTotalOverTimeHoursShift2}, but got ${actualSessionTotalOverTimeHoursShift2}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalOverTimeHoursShift2);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+":  Validate that Total overTime Hours During Interval is correct", function () {

pm.expect(actualTotalHoursOverTimeHoursDuringInterval,`Expected total overTime to be ${expectedTotalHoursOverTimeHoursDuringInterval}, but got ${actualTotalHoursOverTimeHoursDuringInterval}`).to.equal(expectedTotalHoursOverTimeHoursDuringInterval);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+": Validate that nextDay indicator is displayed", function () {
pm.expect(actualIndicatorShift1,`Expected nextDay indicator to be ${expectedIndicatorShift1}, but got ${actualIndicatorShift1}`).to.equal(expectedIndicatorShift1);
pm.expect(actualIndicatorShift2,`Expected nextDay indicator to be ${expectedIndicatorShift2}, but got ${actualIndicatorShift2}`).to.equal(expectedIndicatorShift2);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+": Validate that status is correct", function () {
pm.expect(actualStatusShift1,`Expected status to be ${expectedStatusShift1}, but got ${actualStatusShift1}`).to.equal(expectedStatusShift1);
pm.expect(actualStatusShift2,`Expected status to be ${expectedStatusShift2}, but got ${actualStatusShift2}`).to.equal(expectedStatusShift2);
